name: Drift Of The Hill
description:
Get in the mythical Supra and prove that you are worthy of this car!

In DOTH you will have to master the art of Drifting. Go down the hills to music that will make you want to press the accelerator.

"Fill'er up. High octane" - Keisuke Takahashi



Features :

■ The mythical Supra car!
■ 5 different maps!
■ Addictive drift system!
■ Realistic physics!
■ Detailed interior view!
■ Car characteristics are modifiable!
■ Can be played with a controller!
■ Touge!
■ Eurobeat!
